body.name: Handheld Steam Cleaner, Pressurized Multi-Surface Steam Cleaner with 11pcs Accessories, Chemical Free Multi-Purpose Steam Cleaners for Home Use, Steamer for Cleaning Floor, Tile, Windows, Couch, Grout
body.stockDetail: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 8 mins
features: 𝐆𝐞𝐭 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐉𝐨𝐛 𝐃𝐨𝐧𝐞-- Meet our multi-purpose handheld steamer - designed to make your housework (and life) easier. It’s ideal for cleaning many types of hard surfaces.
𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡 𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫 & 𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐮𝐫𝐞-- This powerful steamer with 𝟏𝟐𝟎𝟎w of power, it can generate pressure steam up to 3.2Bar and the steam temperature reaches 𝟐𝟑𝟎℉. Easily clean stubborn grease, grout and dirt.
𝟑𝟓𝟎𝐌𝐋 𝐋𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞 𝐓𝐚𝐧𝐤-- Steam cleaners have a large 𝟑𝟓𝟎ml tank, which can provide continuous steam for 𝟏𝟎-𝟏𝟓 minutes. With our high pressure steam you can remove surfaces stains and hard to reach corner.

𝐒𝐚𝐟𝐞 & 𝐂𝐡𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞-- Steam cleaner using water, 𝟏𝟎𝟎% chemical free with no harmful fumes or residue. Safety cap for extra protection of your safety! Don't worry about damage and accidents by overheating steam.

𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐭 & 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭-- This powerful little steam cleaner is efficient as it is mobile. You can easily carry steamer wherever you clean, whether it’s room to room or up and down the stairs. The 𝟗.𝟖ft power cord allows you to unplug less frequently.

𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢-𝐏𝐮𝐫𝐩𝐨𝐬𝐞 𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫-- This portable steamer with 𝟏𝟏pcs clean tools. Different accessories can be used to remove grease and grime on tile, sink, kitchen stove, bathroom, floor, window, mirror, toilet, pet mattress, curtains, car seats, upholstery etc. Tackle all areas in your home with the one steam device, saving you time.

𝐓𝐢𝐩𝐬-- Cool for about 𝟑-𝟓 minutes until the safety cap can be opened. ▶️(Pressing the button for to release the remaining steam will speed up the cooling process). ▶️Then open the cap (avoid burns, only when the power was cut off and the internal steam cooled).
body.description: ✨Handheld steam cleaners help keep our homes sparkling by blitzing dirt off all manner of floors and surfaces. 💧Heat treatment requires nothing but tap water, you can steer clear of chemical cleaning products. 🛏️Plus, they’re ideal for cleaning items that you can’t launder or clean using regular detergents, such as soft furnishings, upholstery and mattresses. 🔫Steamer for cleaning is easy to store and comes with an array of attachments–including a flexible extension hose, round brush, door and window cleaning tools and an angled nozzle etc. 👕You can even convert steamer into a clothes steamer by using the accompanying steaming cloth cover. 𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫 𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐮𝐥𝐥𝐲 𝐒𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞 💎We like to keep it simple. How? By creating home appliances that get the job done, brilliantly. No frills, no gimmicks and no features you’ll never use. 🧩We can’t do your housework for you, but we can certainly make it easier. 𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐦 𝐂𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐧𝐞𝐫--𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐄𝐝𝐠𝐞 𝐎𝐟 𝐂𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 💯Upholstery cleaner uses fast steam technology, with fast heating. 🏭Handheld steamer can remove most grease, grout or stains. 𝟏𝟏𝐩𝐜𝐬 𝐀𝐜𝐜𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬 🔧1x Window Cleaning Tool 🔧1x Straingt Nozzle 🔧1x Extension Hose 🔧3x Nylon Brushes 🔧1x Bent Nozzle 🔧1x Ironing Tool 🔧1x Ironing Brush Cloth 🔧1x Measuring Cup 🔧1x Funnel ⚠𝐓𝐢𝐩𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐔𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚 𝐏𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐦 𝐂𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐧𝐞𝐫 ✅Use portable steamer only on surfaces and materials that are sealed and can take high heat and moisture. ✅Ensure that accessory tools are properly and securely attached. ✅Unplug a steamer before refilling with water and before changing attachments. ✅Use care when temporarily putting down a still-hot tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Used and not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: I thought I was purchasing a brand new steam cleaner. But what I got was a used item since I saw water spots on the body of the steamer when taking it out of the box. I also thought it was weird to see the cord not properly tied up as you would think a when purchasing new rather it was just stuffed in and the shotty packing tape to seal the box was a dead give away that what I got was not brand newAlso the reason for the return is the Steamer is not hot enough nor does the output is not strong enough to take off grime from anything you you want clean.I based my purchased on the positive reviews on this item but sadly I can’t say this is one them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Opened right up, I like that they have a funnel & measuring cup. Filled it up & went to work. It heats up quickly, and has a safety cap so you can’t open it until all the pressure is released. Powerful little thing!I used distilled water as I don’t want it to get clogged up with all the chemicals they are adding to our water.I’m really enjoying this steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It’s not getting warm
reviews.reviewText: The steam power is OK it’s pretty strong but the temperature is not getting warm or hotI’m gonna return this and re-order another sellers products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was hoping for more…it’s a meh.Produces steam…yes.Leaks…yesCleans…no, just makes a messCan’t see how much water is left in the container & have to refill too often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Started off good! But ended not so good!
reviews.reviewText: I had high hopes for it! The safety cap just spins for days now no way of getting it back off lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped heating after 4 uses
reviews.reviewText: Work fine a few times then stopped heating. Will return for another brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is amazing! I had not cleaned the grout in my kitchen since FOREVER. In 3 hours, I had all of it absolutely clean! I didn't even remember that my grout was a beige color...not black! Pretty embarrassing to admit. Anyway, it works great to get all the dirt and grime out.
